subject: Pan American Games
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Lance Thomas scored 14 points to lead the United States men’s basketball team to the bronze medal at the Pan American Games with a 94-92 win over the Dominican Republic in Guadalajara, Mexico.
snippet: Lance Thomas scored 14 points to lead the United States men’s basketball team to the bronze medal at the Pan American Games with a 94-92 win over the Dominican Republic in Guadalajara, Mexico.
